title: LLM Assistant Settings
description: Settings for the JupyterLab LLM Assistant extension

model.title: Model
model.description: The model to use for completions

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

systemPrompt.title: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: System prompt to set the behavior of the assistant
systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful AI coding assistant. Help users with programming questions, explain code, debug issues, and provide code examples. Be concise and accurate.

enableStreaming.title: Enable Streaming
enableStreaming.description: Enable streaming responses for real-time output

enableVision.title: Enable Vision
enableVision.description: Enable image input for vision-capable models
